item.title: Dropper Using VBA
item.description: In this post we will talk about how to create a dropper using VBA and some detection stuff. First off, what is VBA and why it is useful. Well VBA stands for Visual Basic for Applications. This language very useful for creation some macros for the Microsoft Office tools. It has very interesting syntax and datatypes. To start coding in VBA we need to create a document, which can support macros.
